channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Florida working to end vaccine mandates

item.title: Newsmax Accuses Fox News of Violating Antitrust Laws
item.description: The smaller outlet in conservative TV news argued in a lawsuit that Fox News had essentially created a monopoly. Fox said the case had no merit.

item.title: Harvard Secures a Court Victory in Its Fight With Trump
item.description: Harvard had sued the Trump administration in an effort to restore billions in research funds that the government canceled this spring.

item.title: China’s Show of Military Might
item.description: Xi Jinping’s huge military parade in Tiananmen Square provided a rare look at China’s new weapons.
